(557)                              (Page 652, B-90-'08--March 24, '08) 
                                   Loma Linda, Calif. Nov. 3, 1907 

Elder J.A. Burden and Others Bearing Responsibilities at Loma Linda 


                                -315- 
Dear Brethren. 

     I feel a deep interest that careful study shall be given to the needs of our institutions at Loma Linda, and that the right moves may be made. In the carrying forward of the word at this place, men of talent and of decided spirituality are needed.
